meaningMnemonic: Two <radical>king</radical>s are here right <radical>now</radical>! We need to entertain them otherwise who knows what they'll do. Get out the <kanji>harp</kanji>, or the <kanji>zither</kanji>, or something.
readingMnemonic:
You may already know that a Japanese <kanji>harp</kanji> is called a こと, but here's a mnemonic to help you if you don't:

When playing your <kanji>harp</kanji>, you always wear your <reading>coat</reading> (こと).
